message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this fantastic product for $15000. It's a real steal!  What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $15000 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a lower price?
Bob, I understand your budget concerns. I'm willing to come down to $14000.  This is a fair price considering the value of this product. What do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $14000 is still a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $13000?
